EmailTemplate.name: 201801_EMEAI_Email_GoDirect_Defense_ mih.201802_EMEAI_GoDirect_defense_Email1_JC
EmailTemplate.subject: Great Meeting You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> CONNECTIVITY | DEFENCE & HELICOPTERS MISSION READY WI-FI Hello {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for visiting the Honeywell stand at International Military Helicopter Conference in London. We know you're busy, so just two requests from us. If you would be interested in joining a webinar to answer your questions on all things connectivity for mission success, please reply to this email with a simple yes. If you would like a member of the sales team to contact you to set up a meeting to discuss your connectivity requirements in person, then please click below and fill in your details. We look forward to hearing from you.
SET UP A MEETING <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/GoDirect_Defense_Email.html]]>
If you would like to know more about our solutions please visit our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Military-Government-Connectivity]]>
